description: UN joint Support to South African 2010 Legacy

subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description: The project aims to develop a FIFA MDG Song.  This is an initiative by UN System in South Africa.  The UN intends to produce and disseminate a song about the MDGs. The idea is to work with eight African artists (one for each MDG), from across the continent, who would together record a song on the 8 MDGs.  This song would be recorded as a music video, which would be screened through the World Cup, across all the Fan Parks and Public Viewing areas. On the day of the finals, all 8 artists would come together to sing the song in a live performance at the Soccer City Fan Fest in Johannesburg.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: UN Support FIFA 2010 Legacy

title: UN Joint Support SA 2010 Legacy
